YogiSTRONG

Posted 16 May 2012

Yogi: (n)
1. One who practices and masters yoga.

Strong: (adj)
1. Involving or possessing physical or mental strength
2. Solid or robust in construction; not easily broken or injured
3. Having a resolute will or morally firm and incorruptible character
4. Intense in quality; not faint or feeble; a strong voice

Private or Group Session


Contact me to schedule a one-on-one or group session at your home, school, or work. Great for fraternities and sororities as well as corporate retreats! Specializing in gong relaxation, addiction therapy, meditation classes and workshops; customized for beginners or advanced students.

About YogiSTRONG

YogiSTRONG is an independent Yoga practice, owned and operated by Gurumantra Kaur (Josephine Fanelli). Based in Potsdam, NY, Gurumantra is the North Country's premier instructor of Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bajan.

Stay Informed!

Subscribe to our mailing list for updates on class offerings, health and wellness tips, meditations, and more!
